#summary ZendFramework integration information

= Overview =

PINF wraps Zend_Tool and makes PINF functionality available to ZF. You can run Zend_Tool (zf) commands through PINF with:

{{{
pinf zf *
}}}

= Roadmap =

  * Call Zend_Tool via PINF command line script *(DONE)*
  * Make PINF variables available to Zend_Tool providers
  * Call PINF for Zend_Tool providers
